game.beginJourney: Begin your mystical journey by adding players
game.gameReset: The game has been reset. Players are ready for a new game.
game.confirmEndGame: Are you sure you want to end the game now? Final scores will be calculated based on current points.
game.selectAdditionalRounds: Select the number of additional rounds
game.allPlayersNeedPoints: All players must have points assigned for the current round
game.ongoingGame: There is an ongoing game. Would you like to continue?
